title: Dynamic Ad insertion (DAI)
custom_steps: WHEN I start a game feed
custom_expected:
THEN I should see calls in charles similar to https://dai.google.com/linear/pods/v1/p/... with a 200 response 
AND ads should be played during commercial breaks from Google DAI

title: Inline AdView on Scoreboard
custom_steps:
GIVEN an Anonymous (Free) or Lite (logged in but not subscribed) USER
WHEN I view the Scoreboard tab selected to card
THEN I will see an Inline Adaptive Banner Ad with the MLB Ad Unit Structure “atbat.free” after every 4 games (for card or compact views)

GIVEN an Anonymous (Free) or Lite (logged in but not subscribed) USER
WHEN I view the Scoreboard tab
THEN the day equivalent “Content Mapping” contentURL from desktop scoreboard will be reported to Google Ad Manager (For Example, August 25, 2021 will be https://www.mlb.com/scores/2021-08-25)

GIVEN an Anonymous (Free) or Lite (logged in but not subscribed) USER
WHEN I view the Scoreboard tab
THEN MLB At Bat : Android : Display Ad Impression will get reported to Adobe Analytics

GIVEN an Anonymous (Free) or Lite (logged in but not subscribed) USER
WHEN I tap on the adaptive banner ad
THEN a browser is launched (not a web view) to the landing page URL

GIVEN a Paid (Audio/Video) USER
WHEN I view the Scoreboard tab
THEN I will not see an Ad

GIVEN an Anonymous (Free) or Lite (logged in but not subscribed) USER
WHEN I view the Scoreboard tab and there are less than 4 games on that day
THEN I will not see an Ad

title: Inline AdView on Team Page
custom_steps:
GIVEN an Anonymous (Free) or Lite (logged in but not subscribed) USER
WHEN I view the Team tab
THEN I will see an Inline Adaptive Banner Ad with the MLB Ad Unit Structure “atbat.free”
(look for siteSection=%2F2605%2Fatbat.free%2Fchc%2Fhome%2Fandroid&.ad&cell in post to eg. mlb.sc.omtrdc.net)

GIVEN an Anonymous (Free) or Lite (logged in but not subscribed) USER
WHEN I view the Team tab
THEN the equivalent “Content Mapping” contentURL from mlb.com desktop will be reported to Google Ad Manager (For Rockies - https://www.mlb.com/rockies)
(look for eg. siteSection=%2F2605%2Fatbat.free%2Fchc%2Fhome%2Fandroid&.ad&cell,&favoriteTeams=chcin post to eg. mlb.sc.omtrdc.net)

GIVEN an Anonymous (Free) or Lite (logged in but not subscribed) USER
WHEN I view the Team tab
THEN MLB At Bat : Android : Display Ad Impression will get reported to Adobe Analytics

GIVEN an Anonymous (Free) or Lite (logged in but not subscribed) USER
WHEN I tap on the adaptive banner ad
THEN a browser is launched to the landing page URL

GIVEN a Paid (Audio/Video) USER
WHEN I view the Team tab
THEN I will not see an Ad

title: Inline AdView on News Index
custom_steps:
GIVEN an Anonymous (Free) or Lite (logged in but not subscribed) USER
WHEN I view the News tab
THEN I will see an Inline Adaptive Banner Ad with the MLB Ad Unit Structure “atbat.free” after each row of 2 articles
(Look for siteSection=%2F2605%2Fatbat.free%2Fmlb%2Fnews%2Fandroid in post to eg. mlb.sc.omtrdc.net)

GIVEN an Anonymous (Free) or Lite (logged in but not subscribed) USER
WHEN I view the News tab
THEN the equivalent “Content Mapping” contentURL from desktop (mlb.com/news) will be reported to Google Ad Manager
(Look for siteSection=%2F2605%2Fatbat.free%2Fmlb%2Fnews%2Fandroid in post to eg. mlb.sc.omtrdc.net)

GIVEN an Anonymous (Free) or Lite (logged in but not subscribed) USER
WHEN I view the News tab
THEN MLB At Bat : Android : Display Ad Impression will get reported to Adobe Analytics

GIVEN an Anonymous (Free) or Lite (logged in but not subscribed) USER
WHEN I tap on the adaptive banner ad
THEN a browser is launched to the landing page URL

GIVEN a Paid (Audio/Video) USER
WHEN I view the News tab
THEN I will not see an Ad

title: Enable/Disable Google Ads Mobile SDK
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a FREE or LITE USER
AND access to the Firebase Console for the software version under test (eg. https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobile-npd/config)
AND active in-line and DAI campaigns and running in your environment

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the MLB App Mobile / enable_admob_sdk Firebase config is set to true
AND it is published
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will see all in-line ads

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the MLB App Mobile / enable_admob_sdk Firebase config is set to false
AND it is published
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will not see any in-line ads

title: Ad request count equals number of ad slots
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Free or Lite USER
AND Proxying via Charles

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is on the Team, Scoreboard, or News pages
AND scrolls down to see ads
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the number of ad requests seen in Charles (eg. URLs pubads.g.doubleclick.net/ or ad.doubleclick.net) equals the number of ads actually viewed

title: Ad requests to the same url are not repeated per slot per session
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Free or Lite USER
AND Proxying via Charles
custom_steps:
WHEN navigating to the Scores or News pages
AND navigating away from and returning to either of the pages
custom_expected: THEN, in the same session, subsequent ad requests to the same url will only be made after initial navigation to the page for 'new' ads that have not yet displayed in a particular slot. Note: the ads may visually look the same but eg. ai guid will be different in url

title: OMSDK Verification
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Free or Lite User
AND using Charles proxy

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the attached file is mapped to https://atbatappconfig.mlb.com/android/5.5.0/ranges.json
AND the user plays content with dai (eg. a game)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the requests similar the following will be seen in Charles:

GET http://iabtechlab.com:66/sendMessage?msg=2%2F26%2F2020%2C%2011%3A56%3A48%20AM%3A%3A%22OmidSupported%5Btrue%5D%22 HTTP/1.1

custom_steps_separated.content:
Alternate test:
WHEN the user plays content with dai (eg. a game)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN calls to mb.moatads or geo.moatads are seen in Charles

title: Unique session id created when switching feeds
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user watching an MLB.TV game in the app that has another feed available
custom_steps: WHEN the user switches feeds via the broadcast options
custom_expected:
THEN a new unique stream id is associated with the new feed
NOTE: Stream id can be accessed via a toast that will pop up after going back and forth from landscape to portrait repeatedly
